snippet: According to an indictment, the former employee stole nearly $100,000 from Masa, an expensive Japanese restaurant in Manhattan.
abstract: Rafael Thomas of the Bronx, former bookkeeper at upscale Japanese restaurant Masa in Manhattan, is indicted for stealing nearly $100,000 in accounting scheme.
lead_paragraph: According to an indictment, the former employee stole nearly $100,000 from Masa, an expensive Japanese restaurant in Manhattan.

headline.seo: Ex-Bookkeeper at Masa Restaurant Charged With Theft of $100,000
headline.main: Ex-Bookkeeper Is Charged With Theft at Restaurant
headline.print_headline: Ex-Bookkeeper Is Charged With Theft at Restaurant
